Besides our group, have you attended other meetups? What types of meetups have you enjoyed, and what made them memorable?
Many people are moving away from dating apps and joining social meetups like running crews. Why do you think people are seeking more in-person connections these days?
Running crews have become increasingly popular in Seoul. Have you ever participated in one, or would you consider joining? What appeals to you about this trend?
Some people say running crews are a great way to meet new people and stay active, while others find them disruptive. What are your thoughts on the pros and cons of these groups?
How do you feel about the shift from dating apps to more social activities like running clubs or game-based dating events? Do you think this trend will continue to grow?
SNL Korea recently covered the rise of running crews in Seoul. Why do you think this topic is becoming so popular in media and entertainment?

Some cities have started implementing rules to limit the size of running groups due to safety concerns. Do you think these restrictions are necessary, or do they take away from the fun of group activities?
Have you noticed any changes in how people interact socially post-pandemic? Do you think meetups and group activities are helping people reconnect?
Running crews often emphasize community and inclusivity, but some argue they can be exclusive or cliquish. What has been your experience with group dynamics in meetups or clubs?
If you could organize your own social meetup, what type of event would it be, and why?
Have you ever felt the need to change your career or learn a new skill later in life? What motivated you, or what would motivate you to take that step?

How important is perseverance when facing setbacks in your career or personal goals? Can you share a time when perseverance paid off for you?
What role does storytelling play in personal or professional success? Have you used storytelling in your own life to achieve something?

How can someone develop a growth mindset, especially when dealing with uncertainty or change in their life?
